content: Watch what our clients have to say about their experience.
Celebrity, renowned Marathi cine actor shares his thoughts and appreciation for our health philosophy and his personal experience with the process.

A dedicated homemaker, Rajshree Shivpuje has not only embraced our health and wellbeing philosophy with determination, but has also triumphed over personal health challenges. Her inspiring transformation led her to bring both her mother and daughter into this journey — making wellness a true family commitment. Her testimonial reflects belief, action, and results.
A powerful expression by Manasi Ambardekar, who shares how the 7.4 process reversed her diabetes, achieved weightloss and could sustain over a period of 5 years.
